H0.text: What colour are the two stars on the national flag of Syria. Red

H1.text: What colour are the two stars on the national flag of Syria. Yellow

H2.text: What colour are the two stars on the national flag of Syria. Blue

H3.text: What colour are the two stars on the national flag of Syria. Green

A4.text: The Ba'athist Syrian flag德尔 is described in Article 6 of the 2012 Constitution of Syria. The first paragraph of the Article states: The flag of the Syrian Arab Republic consists of four colours: red, white and black, with two green stars, of five angles each.

A5.text: The flag is rectangular, with its width measuring two-thirds of its length. It is divided into three rectangles of identical dimensions and have the same length as the flag. The upper one is red, the middle being white and the bottom one is black, with the two green stars in the middle of the white rectangle.
